name: Everything is Bro' Ken
description:
This Top down shooter is my first foray into game jams and 2D games it was developed for the 2021 coding blocks game jam. 

The theme of the Jam was "Everything was broken" so rather than breaking things, I decided to have a story involving my Bro (brother) Ken* who has sent his fleet of ships to attack our civilians, as our brave leader you must defend our ice planets and kill 100 of Ken's ships to win.

*I do not really have a brother called Ken.

Credits:

Artwork: My Daughter

Gameplay\Story\Software: Me
